Saie Hydrabeam, Seven: Deep

Brand: Saie

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: ISOCETYL STEAROYL STEARATE GLYCERIN GLYCERYL STEARATE TRIBEHENIN SAMBUCUS NIGRA (ELDERBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT SILICA GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL SQUALANE CAPRYLOYL GLYCERIN/SEBACIC ACID COPOLYMER MICA SOLANUM LYCOPERSICUM (TOMATO) FRUIT EXTRACT CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT

ROOT EXTRACT SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL SQUALANE CAPRYLOYL GLYCERIN/SEBACIC ACID COPOLYMER MICA SOLANUM LYCOPERSICUM (TOMATO) FRUIT EXTRACT CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT XYLITYLGLUCOSIDE ANHYDROXYLITOL XYLITOL ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) STARCH TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI77891) IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity
